name: $not-started
desc: Appointment or other booking has occurred but activity has not yet begun.

name: $scheduled
desc: Care plan activity has been started but is not yet complete.

name: $in-progress
desc: Care plan activity was started but has temporarily ceased with an expectation of resumption at a future time.

name: $on-hold
desc: Care plan activity has been completed (more or less) as planned.

name: $completed
desc: The planned care plan activity has been withdrawn.

name: $cancelled
desc: The current state of the care plan activity is not known.  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which one.

name: $unknown
desc: Care plan activity was entered in error and voided.
